channel.title: Time to part ways!
channel.description:
It is said that once in a while a person has to reinvent himself (I follow Zen philosophy). I believe it's my time to answer myself to the questions I've been pondering upon for quite some time now. So I've decided to go on a break, facing the uncertainty of life to refuel the mind.
Home is not a place but a feeling and I feel home in here seeing all these lovely enthusiasts. I couldn't contribute much but I wish this place will grow into something majestic and a harbor to everyone who seek knowledge.
"Parting is such sweet sorrow that I shall say goodnight till it be morrow."
Regards,
Cal0X

item.title: Time to part ways!
item.dc:creator: kowalski
item.description:
You’ll be surely missed for the time you’re gone. Good Luck!

Read full topic
